sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Carousel, Image, Col, Row, ListGroup, Container, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../Loader' const HomeShowPage = ({ match }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const home = useSelector(state => state.home) const { loading } = home useEffect(() => { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/v1/homes/${match.params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(home => { dispatch({ type: 'SET_HOME', home: home, loading: false }) } )}, [dispatch, match]) function renderCarousel() { return ( {home.photos.map(photo => (
{photo.image_name}
 ))} ) } return ( <>

{home.location}

 {home.photos ? renderCarousel() : null}

{home.description} Your Amenities Include: Bedrooms: {home.bedroom} Bathrooms: {home.bathroom} Accommodates: {home.accommodates} guests {home.pets_allowed ? Pet Friendly: yes : Pet Friendly: no } {home.internet ? Wifi: yes : Wifi: no } {home.central_air ? A/C: yes : A/C: no } {home.heating ? Heating: yes : Heating: no } {home.tv ? TV: yes : TV: no } ${home.daily_price} / night
) } export default HomeShowPage
